scenario_text.value: I can’t believe he’s such an idiot!
(Hm? Was that...Miu?)
Oh, uh...did you hear that just now?!

Yeah, sorry. I didn’t mean to eavesdrop. But
do you really think Kaito’s that bad?

*sigh* Well, who even cares? I say bad things
about him all the time.

Yeah, but still, it doesn’t feel good to hear
that kind of thing.

Don’t you think he’s just so annoying,
though?

And anyway, he is way too overprotective. I’m
not a little kid anymore!

(Miu seems like she’s feeling pretty
stressed.)

(But it’s not like I can just join in on
bashing Kaito.)
(I should try and calm her down...)
What should I say to Miu?
I know how you feel.
At least he worries.
Try talking with him.
I know how you feel.
Right?! I can’t believe him!

So what if my parents hardly say anything to
me? That doesn’t make him my dad!

(Oops. I was just trying to empathize, but
I guess I made things worse.)

(Seems like Miu’s even more stressed out than
I thought...)

Well, at least he worries. That can be a good
thing.
It can also be super annoying!

Say I want to eat slowly, really savor it.
He’s all over me about not wasting food!

If I’m a little late for school, he’s out
there looking for me, screaming my name.

And that’s not all! There’s tons of other
things like that!
Well, that just goes to show how worried—

Yeah, yeah, enough already. I know what
you’re going to say.

Only it’s tough! Dealing with him being that
worried about me is hard!

Sheesh. I wish he’d get a girlfriend or
something already.
I think you should try talking with him.

I mean, easy enough for you to say, but do
you really think he’ll listen?

I think what matters is that you tell him how
you feel. He means a lot to you, doesn’t he?
No, he really does... Urrrgh!

(Sounds like she can’t quite bring herself to
deny it.)

(I guess that’s proof she doesn’t hate him or
anything.)

Anyway, talking with me isn’t going to solve
things between you and your brother.

Yeah, I know... *sigh* If only my brother was
more like you.
What? More like me?!
